Details: Gain a new combat feat and a new exploration feat.
2 AP, 3 essence spells. 3 tile range, 1 tile radius, half effect on miss. Pick a subclass. The plurality of concoctions known must be from that list.

You have advantage on all skill checks made as part of the Activate action. You may create consumables that cast one of your concoctions when you use the Devise downtime activity. You must select any twists in advance.
When you use the Catalyze action, provoke an attack of opportunity.
Ignore up to 2 points of negative loyalty towards you.
Increase one Attribute of your choice by 1.
Gain a new combat feat and a new exploration feat.
Gain the metamagic associated with your subclass.
Whenever your party gains a Resolve, gain the benefit of the Prepare downtime activity. You must select Anima, Fontcraft or Tinkering.
Increase one Attribute of your choice by 1.
Gain a new combat feat and a new exploration feat.
Whenever anyone in your party rolls a 20 while making a skill check outside of combat, gain a Resolve.
Increase one Attribute of your choice by 1.
Gain a new combat feat and a new exploration feat.
Gain a subclass specific effect whenever you use the Activate action.
